body.p: Indeed under the cirumstances he feels that it would be a great hardship for him to be compelled to pay anything. He also here submits the affidavits of Thomas W Picking and Bryant Nichols and earnestly solicits a remission of said Judgment
Newman Estes this day personally appeared before me and was sworn by me that the statements in the foregoing petition he believes to be true, this 26th day of Novr 1863.

J. C. Barnes Examiner
for Caldwell County
& Deputy for E. P. Watkins
clerk Caldwell Circuit Court

Remit
Caldwell Cir Ct
vs
Newman Estes
$7,000 forfeiture
12th Dec/ 63
The Defense was sufficient & should have been no held by the court, the Judgment of the court was wrong upon the facts
Therefo I therefore unhesitatingly Remit all except fees and costs & make the exception because of the constitutional restriction
